content: Sodium diethyldithiocarbamate dihydrate (0.342 g, 2.0 mmol) was dissolved in methanol (20 mL) and Triphenylbismuth (0.511 g, 1.0 mmol) was dissolved in THF (20 mL)and added. The mixed solution was stirred at 25 °C for 24 h. The mixture was dried in vacuo and extracted by ethanol (10 mL) and dichloromethane (10 mL). The extract was concentrated to 5 mL and crystallization for 2 weeks at 25 °C gave colorless single crystals. Elemental Anal Calc (%) for the complex : C 28.10, H 3.20, N 2.98. Found (%): C 28.06, H 3.15, N 2.95. IR (KBr, cm−1): 1595 (m), 1465 (s), 1246, 1130 (m), 958, 549, 441 (s). 1H NMR (DMSO-d6, 600 MHz) δ (ppm): 1.46 (d, 6H), 2.84 (d, 4H), 7.85 (m, 5H).
clean_text:
Syntheses

Synthesis of [PhBiS2CN(C2H5)2Cl]n

Sodium diethyldithiocarbamate dihydrate (0.342 g, 2.0 mmol) was dissolved in methanol (20 mL) and Triphenylbismuth (0.511 g, 1.0 mmol) was dissolved in THF (20 mL)and added. The mixed solution was stirred at 25 °C for 24 h. The mixture was dried in vacuo and extracted by ethanol (10 mL) and dichloromethane (10 mL). The extract was concentrated to 5 mL and crystallization for 2 weeks at 25 °C gave colorless single crystals. Elemental Anal Calc (%) for the complex : C 28.10, H 3.20, N 2.98. Found (%): C 28.06, H 3.15, N 2.95. IR (KBr, cm-1): 1595 (m), 1465 (s), 1246, 1130 (m), 958, 549, 441 (s). 1H NMR (DMSO-d6, 600 MHz) δ (ppm): 1.46 (d, 6H), 2.84 (d, 4H), 7.85 (m, 5H).

other properties: Elemental Anal Calc (%) for the complex : C 28.10, H 3.20, N 2.98. Found (%): C 28.06, H 3.15, N 2.95.
